sentence: It is worrisome on its face that partisan interest so overwhelms honesty that Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger are somehow controversial for refusing to meekly shut up, or for wanting the events of 1/6 and the things that preceded it to be investigated, while Elise Stefanik and Kevin McCarthy are in good standing.
author: Jason Lee Steorts
title: Belated 1/6-Anniversary Thoughts, with Mountain Lions

author: Mychael Schnell
title: Cheney, Kinzinger call out Trump over Pence comments
